Included in content model of elements (1):
usage
Known Usage Locations
  • Within global complexTypes (1):
    usageType [ref]
Annotation

Attribute

Description

Identifies an attribute within the element(s) identified by the selector or specificElements in which the controlled vocabulary is used. The fully qualfied name used here must correspond to that in the instance, which is to say that if the attribute is namespace qualified, the prefix used here must match that which is defined in the instance.
XML Source (w/o annotations (1); see within schema source)
<xs:element name="attribute" type="attributeType"/>
